title: Animated developer portfolio highlighting 9+ years journey, 100+ websites, apps, and digital services

requirements.text: Create a single-page (or small multi-section) developer portfolio site with clear navigation and sections for: Hero/Intro, 9+ years journey (timeline), Websites experience (100+), App development experience, Digital marketing/SEO, Graphic design services, and Contact/CTA.

quotes: build a portfolio for software developer having 9+ years of experience developed 100+ websites... also having experience in app development... also having experience in digital marketing, seo and graphic designing

acceptanceCriteria: A visitor can reach all required sections via a top navigation (sticky or in-page anchors).
All section headings and body text are in English.

Content explicitly includes: “9+ years of experience”, “100+ websites”, and mentions websites across schools/real estate/ecommerce/others, plus apps across fintech/cryptocurrency/real-estate/e-commerce/travel, plus digital marketing/SEO/graphic designing.

requirements.text: Implement a polished animation system that visually tells the developer’s “9+ years journey” in a professional way, including a timeline section with animated milestones revealed on scroll (e.g., fade/slide, parallax accents, progress indicator).

quotes: develop the portfolio having beautiful animation which defines my 9+ years journey very beautifully and professionally

acceptanceCriteria: Timeline milestones animate in as the user scrolls (no auto-playing-only animation).
Animations are smooth and performant on modern desktop and mobile browsers.
Provide a user-accessible reduced-motion mode (respect prefers-reduced-motion) that disables or simplifies motion effects.

requirements.text: Add a “Work / Projects” presentation that clearly communicates breadth without listing 100+ items: include category-based highlights for Websites (Schools, Real Estate, E-commerce, Other) and Apps (Fintech, Cryptocurrency, Real Estate, E-commerce, Travel), with a clean, filterable or tabbed UI and short descriptions per category.

quotes: developed 100+ websites for schools, real estates, ecommerce and other... developed multiple apps for fintech related, cryptocurrency, real-estate app, e commerce app, traveling app

acceptanceCriteria: Websites and Apps are each presented with categories matching the user’s list.
UI supports switching between categories (tabs, segmented control, or filters).
Each category contains at least a short English description and representative highlights (non-exhaustive).

requirements.text: Add a “Services” section positioning the developer as a “one stop solution” including: Web development, App development, Digital marketing, SEO, and Graphic design, with concise service cards and a clear primary CTA leading to the contact section.

quotes: basically one stop solution to all your requirement

acceptanceCriteria: Services list includes all five areas: web dev, app dev, digital marketing, SEO, graphic design.
Each service is represented as a consistent card with title + short English description.
There is a prominent CTA button that scrolls/navigates to the contact section.

requirements.text: Create a contact section suitable for a portfolio site: include a simple contact form UI (name, email, message) and also display optional contact methods placeholders (e.g., email/LinkedIn) without requiring third-party integrations.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes fields: name, email, message, with basic client-side validation.
Submitting the form shows a clear success/failure state in the UI (mock/local-only is acceptable).
No third-party auth, email service, or external integrations are required to use the site.

requirements.text: Apply one coherent, distinctive visual theme for a premium, professional portfolio (avoid default/template look), including consistent typography, spacing system, and a restrained color palette (do not use a blue+purple dominant scheme).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across all sections (headings, buttons, cards, background accents).
Color palette is not dominated by blue+purple.
Layout is responsive and looks polished on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

requirements.text: Add static generated image assets to elevate visual quality (hero background/illustration and a small set of category/service icons) and render them from the frontend as static files (do not proxy images through the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Hero section uses the generated hero image as a prominent visual element.
Category/service visuals use the generated icons consistently (size, style, alignment).

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; only compose/reuse those components.
Do not introduce third-party authentication (only Internet Identity is supported, but it is not required for this portfolio).
Do not add unsupported integrations (no external email/SMS/push/LLM services).
nonGoals: Admin dashboard or CMS for editing portfolio content.
A full blog system with rich editing, comments, or real-time features.
Payments, subscriptions, or customer checkout flows.

required: Abstract premium hero background illustration with subtle tech motifs (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Minimal line-icon set (consistent stroke) representing: School, Real Estate, E-commerce, Fintech, Cryptocurrency, Travel (icons-set.dim_1024x1024.png)
Minimal line-icon set (consistent stroke) representing: Digital Marketing, SEO, Graphic Design, Web Development, App Development (services-icons.dim_1024x1024.png)
Timeline decorative illustration element (e.g., vertical path/constellation style) (timeline-accent.dim_1200x2400.png)
